title: Reservations and E-Commerce
description: Built Zero’s e-commerce platform in the U.S., enabling reservations, full online purchases, and a Past Editions sales experience. Delivered mobile-first UX, API integrations, and lean MVPs that drove 14% of all U.S. motorcycle sales.

title: Unified Lead and Dealer Locator System
description: Delivered a cross-functional initiative connecting Zero’s lead forms, dealer network, and global CRM. Resulted in a 34% improvement in lead accuracy and consistent data standards across CRM and marketing systems.

title: Dash Prototype: Future Interaction Model
description: Partnered with the motorcycle UX team to develop early navigation concepts for Zero’s future dash application and ran a 20-participant usability study that surfaced a faster, more intuitive interaction model for upcoming products.

title: Stories: CMS-Driven Storytelling Platform
description: Built a scalable, CMS-driven Stories platform that empowered the marketing team to publish content independently, driving a 45% increase in session duration, more than doubling deep-scroll engagement, and creating evergreen content for SEO.

title: Events Management System
description: Created a unified events system with type-safe data, self-serve dealer submissions, and a modern public events page with registration form integration. Reduced manual steps and powered global demo tours.
